评论概述: Not a stretchy fabric, funny poorly translated English
评论详情: Unfortunately, my hips are to wide for these pants (54"). There is barely any give to the elastic waistband and it is impossible to pull them up any farther than my thighs. They are cute though. Another thing I want to note, the decoritive tag gave me a bit of a chuckle. "People cry not besause thry  're werk." 😂
Quality is as expected for the price, but I would definitely recommend buying a size up if you're planning to wear them for more frequent/active use.
Got it for my kid and he loves them. He wears it all the time!
I’ve gotten tons of compliments on these pants! They are comfortable, stylish, and look great! Pockets could be a little better but overall not too much to complain about

I only bought there because I needed them by Halloween and the other options wouldn't arrive on time. Based on the other reviews, I had love expectations, but they are actually super comfortable and fairlydurable! I got tons of compliments. That said, there are a bunch of loose threads and I haven't tried washing them yet. I'll come back and update if they fall apart.
Looks great. Heavy fabric and nice quality. 5’11” and the medium works well. Love the color pop of purple. Washes well and didn’t shrink. Feels like heavy cotton. Fits nicely and sized correctly.

I needed a pair of baggy jeans and these were rather good looking to me, they came in the mail quick and I tried them on and they fit like a charm and had a nice baggy feel to them. The only thing to me is the sizes. I ordered a medium and the pants were an XL, but, when I tried them on, again they fitted me well. Not sure if I didn't really read the measurement charts right or not but yeah they are extremely nice.
A mi hijo le quedó perfecto la talla es la adecuada.

I love these pants! They're so comfy. The material it's made out of is pretty thick but still breathable. The only downsides I can find is that the pants are orange and black, not red and black like the picture shows and also beware of the fact that these pants do in fact SHRINK. I still love them though! I'm around 190lbs--female and they fit me comfortably.
